Title: Establishes the Sickle cell disease education and mapping program
Summary: Establishes the sickle cell disease education and mapping program to promote the screening and detection of sickle cell disease, educate the public regarding sickle cell disease, provide counseling and referral services and map locations of occurrence of sickle cell disease.
LawCode: Add ยง2500-m, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a sickle cell education and mapping program
